Nov 29, 2022 - Release Notes

almost 3 years ago by Minh Do

New features

Display of Pricing Plan and Free Trial Period invRoute

  • New users registering via abivin.com are now able to see their plan and free trial period when logged into vRoute

Several bug fixes
